sentences.sentence: Anti-malarial vaccines are now undergoing trials.
sentences.translation: 抗疟疾疫苗现在正处于试验阶段。

sentences.sentence: Rapid treatment with effective anti-malarial medicines.
sentences.translation: 迅速使用有效的抗疟疾药物进行治疗。

sentences.sentence: Will an ambitious plan to subsidise anti-malarial pills work?
sentences.translation: 资助抗疟疾药的庞大计划会有效吗？
